title: The Medieval crusades
creator_credit: Milan Herzog and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Uses animation, live action, and recreated settings in discussing the causes of the crusades, their influence on European life, and the events and achievements of the first four crusades. Dramatises the adventures of two young knights who accompany the first crusade to Jerusalem in the last years of the eleventh century. Filmed in Southern France and the Holy Land.
